name: Staff Range +1
desc:
<red>CA:</>+1 Range to Staves. <green>CD:0 Turns</>
This effect is always active during EP.
components: unit.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(unit, unit.get_weapon()) not in ('Anima', 'Light', 'Dark', 'Sword', 'Lance', 'Axe', 'Bow', 'Monster')
